item.title: Phil Dunster on sharing a dressing room with Jonah Hauer-King while they were working on the play ‘THE ENTERTAINER’: “Sharing our deepest, darkest secrets. Painting each other’s nails. Me falling in love with him and the occasional sing-along with a guitar.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Jonah Hauer-King on Phil Dunster, who he worked with before on a play: “He’s the best. We shared a dressing room for months on that show, I loved it. It was so fun. He’s brilliant. We shared a dressing room and got very comfortable with each other.”
(https://squaremile.com/culture/film-tv/jonah-hauer-king-little-mermaid/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Jonah Hauer-King on Halle Bailey: “I was blown away by her. I was so impressed that she deals with everything with such graciousness and elegance. The more I worked with her, the more I realised how incredible she was and how born she was for the role.”
(https://squaremile.com/culture/film-tv/jonah-hauer-king-little-mermaid/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates
